text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
Its very ascent was always met
with unbridled passion.

text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
It was a time when racing
found its glory and pride.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I challenged the world, only to realize
how wide the gap truly was.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
And yet, determined to face the future,
on that day, I stood up once more.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
What began as entertainment for a select few,
grew into a national sensation.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
The day all of Japan was seized by
the fever of racing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
But today... that love has been
reduced to a memory.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
The fervor has faded to a quiet slumber... now,
all that remains is the whisper of wind on
the turf.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Is this truly the end of racing?
Will "that day" never return?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Let us fill the turf with cheers that
outshine those of old.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Together, we will set the Twinkle Series
ablaze once more!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: â€”the legend that will echo through time.
